The breakout Zone

It’s April 2040… this is where two friends Waseem and Husaini’s journey begins! A virus has infected the water supply of continental Europe. They are aged 19 and 20 and are abandoned by the population to survive alone, it may have been an accident but they are still in grave danger. A T.V show follows Husaini and Waseem as they try to survive. The remaining people have been hypnotised to watch without believing it is actually a twisted way to entertain the population while the abandoned suffer a supposedly endless fate. Meanwhile the evil scientist Darren Brown meddles with the virus but soon realises there’s no known cure or no way to kill the infected which are taking over!
